A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A spit on the existing lore. The plot is too thin\, too fiddling around. Basically\, the whole plot is that resistance is trying to run away from First Order pursuit. For 2.5 hrs! Phasma is always mending to be underwhelming\, but Snoke! Seriously! Rather than fleshing out Rose arc\, I prefer we find out Snoke's\, Rey's backstory\, or even Luke's clear motives before his exile. Rotten to the core.
